attributes.action: Scrap price per mile proposals which would see vehicles averaging 40 miles per gallon, charged at the proposed peak rate of £1.34 per mile, paying the equivalent of 40 x £1.34 equating to £53.60 plus approx £4.50 per gallon of fuel, or the equivalent of £58.,10 per gallon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
